vsParam:
Amaryllis~!
Thank you for inviting us!

Wooooooowaaaaaaaaaah!!
It's the ocean! I'm coming!!

Ah!? Sue, wait!
You can't go into the ocean with your clothes on!

And you must warm up first... Ah!
Ugh, so salty...

Ha-ha-ha, you're being careless, Lydie!
Careless people would lose in seaside games!

Humph...! Wait and see, Sue!
I'll splash water on you this time~!!

The azure and beautiful ocean...!
So spectacular, Logy...!
Next time we'd take Escha here...

Guys, you've adapted yourselves too quickly~
Completely in holiday mode.

Ha-ha-ha, because everyone was so looking forward to it.
I also want to get into the water right now!

... Ah, right.
I'm kind of interested. Do you mind showing me your legs?

Huh, legs?
Ah, sure. Please â™ª

Let me see...
Wow, you really got beautiful legs...

Right~? I must thank Rod.
Heehee~ Now I can go find ingredients for my "Love Song"!

It's a tradition in Eruleum to sing a song
we create to someone we love in summer.

Ah, it's Verbena~!
You look pretty good!
Ah, thanks to you... But I'm already dead.

Well~ Summer is the season of love! And, "Love Songs"
are indispensable for this season~!

I really look forward to it~ Listen. There are people
singing "Love Songs" everywhere in Eruleum, right?

Yeah, especially in this season... Perhaps it's because
there are many visitors from other territories.

Yeah, it's a good thing.
Plus, I can walk on land now...

I shall create the best "Love Song" this year!
... That's what I'm gonna do!

"Love Song"...?
Hehe, then you must work hard for it.

Humph~ That sounds discouraging~
What about you, Verbena?

Although you are a ghost now... I suppose you
have dated once or twice before, right?

Ah, sounds like something special happened~!
Interesting, very interesting~!!
Did you have a hot love affair!?

... Ah, I haven't finished the work assigned by Lord Rod.
Uh? [px], have you got nothing to do?

This, this... and this. [px], you're not otherwise engaged,
I'm sure you can finish them very quickly, right?
Wow, she changed the topic just like that...

And we've been given 3 pieces of work!?
And they look pretty urgent!

Uh, we'd get scolded if we leave the work unattended...
Let's finish some before we take the holiday...
